aka: Cream Lemon - The Shape of Buds
this_title: くりいむレモン 蕾のかたち
trans_title: Cream Lemon - The Shape of Buds
introduction: 【Based on comic books】The Creamlemon Video Series based on the popular manga of the same title, focusing on the forbidden love between brothers and sisters. 2nd Title: Is love meant to hurt so much?Encouraged by friends, Ami, a 17 year-old-girl takes part in a star contest and captures the attention of Amamiya, the president of an idol management company. Ami lives with her brother, Hiroshi, a popular porn stills cameraman. His trick is that he sleeps with his subjects as he takes photos of them.When Amamiya fails to have his way with Ami, he decides to devise a scheme to get back at her. Amamiya knows that Hiroshi loves gambling and invites him to play. However, it’s a trap by Amamiya and if Hiroshi loses it, he must take photos of Ami nude.....
foreign_title: くりいむレモン 蕾のかたち
